entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
